text: Marcel Łoziński (born 17 May 1940) is a Polish film director and screenwriter. He has directed 22 films since 1972. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short for 89mm from Europe. He was born in Paris, France. ==Selected filmography== * 89mm from Europe (1993) * Wszystko moze sie przytrafic [Anything Can Happen] (1995) * Żeby nie bolało [So It Doesn't Hurt] (1998) * Pamiętam [I Remember] (2001).
